column1: 323112,Aircraft Maintenance Engineer (Mechanical),,"Inspect mechanical components of vehicles to identify problems
column3: Inspect structural components of vehicles to identify problems
column5: Repair worn, damaged, or defective mechanical parts
column7: Inspect completed work to ensure proper functioning
column11: Communicate with co-workers to coordinate installations or repairs
column13: Clean or repair equipment, parts or tools
column17: Read technical information needed to perform maintenance or repairs
column19: Read work orders or descriptions of problems to determine repairs or modifications needed
column21: Maintain inventories of materials, equipment or products
column25: Replace worn, damaged or defective mechanical parts
column29: Install machine or equipment replacement parts
column33: Test mechanical equipment to ensure proper functioning
column35: Cut materials according to specifications or needs
column39: Lay out work according to specifications
column41: Test fluids to identify contamination or other problems
column45: Remove parts or components from equipment
column47: Inspect mechanical equipment to locate damage, defects or wear
column49: Operate cranes, hoists or other moving or lifting equipment
column51: Observe equipment in operation to detect potential problems
column53: Drill holes in parts, equipment or materials
column55: Assemble electrical components, subsystems or systems
column57: Install electrical components, equipment or systems
column59: Install piping for installation or maintenance activities
column61: Lubricate equipment to allow proper functioning
column63: Move large objects using heavy equipment
column65: Troubleshoot equipment or systems operation problems
column67: Disassemble equipment to inspect for deficiencies
